parts.title: Part 1 - Course Introduction
parts.description: Welcome to your first lesson in web development. In this video, you'll meet your professor and learn what to expect in this course.
keyConcepts: What to expect in this course

question2.text: Which of the following is true about learning how to code?

options.text: You can learn how to code only by watching videos.
You have to write perfect code every time.
Learning how to code takes lots of practice and you will make many mistakes along the way.

parts.title: Part 2 - How the Internet Works
parts.description: Learn about how the Internet works, including clients, servers, and the difference between frontend and backend web development.

question1.text: Which machine is connected directly to the Internet and waits for a request?

question2.text: Which of the following can make HTTP requests and read HTML code?

question3.text: Which HTTP status code means the resource requested could not be found?

parts.title: Part 3 - VS Code & File Management
parts.description: In this video, you will learn how to install VS Code and set up your folders and files for this class.
keyConcepts: Setup folders and files for this class

question1.text: Which of the following statements are TRUE about VS Code?

options.text: VS Code is a tool where you can write code.
You can change the VS Code theme to different colors.
Send the screenshot to everyone on WhatsApp
Send the screenshot to my WhatsApp subgroup
Email the screenshot to the instructor
DM the screenshot to a Learning Assistant
